dom: <input aria-label="apply" aria-required="false" class="c-form__text c-cart-add-promo__input js-cart-add-promo__input ng-pristine ng-untouched ng-valid ng-valid-pattern" data-qa-add-promo-input="" id="promo-code" name="promocode" ng-focus="clearerrors()" ng-model="promo.code" ng-pattern="/^[a-z0-9_@!]*$/i" type="text" urbn-uppercase-model=""/>

<input class="c-form__email js-cart-contact-info__email-input ng-pristine ng-untouched ng-invalid ng-invalid-required ng-valid-email" data-qa-contact-email="" id="email" name="email" ng-blur="actions.checkforprofile()" ng-disabled="!data.anonymous() && data.contactinfo.email" ng-focus="actions.hideexistingaccountmsg()" ng-model="data.contactinfo.email" ng-readonly="!data.anonymous() && data.contactinfo.email" ng-required="true" required="required" type="email"/>

<input autocomplete="off" class="c-form__tel ng-pristine ng-untouched ng-invalid ng-invalid-required ng-valid-pattern ng-valid-minlength ng-valid-maxlength" data-qa-address-form-phone-number="" id="phone-shipping" maxlength="30" minlength="" name="phonenumber" ng-change="resetformfielderror('phonenumber')" ng-model="address.phonenumber" ng-pattern="^[\d \(\-\.)]*$" ng-required="isfieldrequired('phonenumber')" placeholder="do not enter a country code" required="required" type="tel" urbn-numeric-model=""/>
feature: daytime phone tel phone shipping do not enter a country code phonenumber 30
